channel.title: Music – 에드워드 전
channel.description: Recent content in 에드워드 전 on Music

item.title: 에드워드 전 - Give My Love(English) (마지막 춤은 나와함께)
item.description:
When I look
in your eyes
I can see that you
want to be with me
But you’re so scared
and I don’t know
What to say or do
but the tears
Keep falling
from your eyes
And I know that
times won’t change
My love
and I can’t do
Nothing to keep you
oh I’ll give my love
Oh when I hold
you tight
Give my love
through kisses
Oh so bright
and you know
That I can’t change
my love
Take my love all
through the night
As the hours pass away
you think that
Love ain’t here
to stay
Feel a beat
from your chest
But you don’t
give doubt
A moment’s rest
you dream the future
And all you see
is dark
Listen to your heart
baby
The truth will
set sparks
Now I’ll give
my love
Oh when I hold you
tight
Give my love
through kisses
Oh so bright
and you know
That I can’t change
my love
Take my love all
through the night

Now I’ll give
my love
Oh when I hold you
tight
Give my love
through kisses
Oh so bright
and you know
That I can’t change
my love
Take my love all
through the night
I’ll give
my love
Oh when I hold you
tight
Give my love
through kisses
Oh so bright
and you know
That I can’t change
my love
Take my love all
through the night
